About Us | Port LaBelle Inn & Conference Center (863) 675-4411 Booking@stmatthewshouse.org 1563 Oxbow Dr. LaBelle Fl 33935 0 Items Home About Us Port LaBelle Inn Catering Booking Contact Us Select Page About US At the Port LaBelle Inn and Conference Center, we focus on the critical details so you are able concentrate on your retreat or conference. The logistics, environment, meals and more will all be managed for you by our professional staff and full-service on-site food & beverage team. Let our catering team execute the work for you so you can focus on the business that matters. Our full-service, on-site, professional F&B team offers a variety of menus to suit your catering needs. From breakfast buffets to prime rib dinners ‚Äì allow us to custom-build your perfect event.¬† As always, our catering menus can act as simply a suggestion ‚Äì we are happy to build a menu to suit your palette. We are a drug and alcohol-free facility. Unfortunately, pets are not accepted. Service animals only. Book Now! Find moments of joy wherever your travels take you! Come visit and stay in our luxurious rooms! Reserve a room! Sprout Catering Established in 2015 as a social enterprise to support the efforts of St. Matthew‚Äôs House, Sprout Catering provides the freshest food possible to its catering customers in Southwest Florida. Learn More About Sprout Catering! Events We host events which include weddings, birthday, and business meetings. Check Event Availability! Stay Connected! (863) 675-4411 | Booking@stmatthewshouse.org

LaBelle Winery | LinkedIn Skip to main content LinkedIn Top Content People Learning Jobs Games Sign in Join now LaBelle Winery Hospitality Amherst, New Hampshire 1,383 followers Offering an Unrivaled NH Winery Experience See jobs Follow Discover all 94 employees Report this company About us Plan your visit to one of our beautiful locations in Amherst or Derry, NH!

Experience our state-of-the-art, award-winning winery in Amherst and enjoy a fun, educational and relaxed visit.  Whether you join us for a wine tasting & tour, view our fine art gallery, shop in our Wine and Gift Shop or dine in our Bistro restaurant, we're sure you'll enjoy every moment of your time with us.  Sign up for an enrichment program such as yoga or wine and culinary classes (to name a few) that will enhance your visit.  LaBelle Amherst is home to an event center for hosting private corporate, social or non-profit events.

Plan a day at LaBelle Derry, our newest location. In addition to an event center and Americus Restaurant, our Derry property features a beautiful 9-hole par-3 golf course and miniature golf course. Stop by LaBelle Market for delicious coffee, homemade pastries, delicious food on-the-go, snacks and more; plus all of our wine and The Winemaker's Kitchen culinary line for shopping.

LaBelle Winery consistently receives the awarded distinction of Best New Hampshire Winery; Best Tasting Room; Best Local Winery and Vineyard; and Best Wine Selection, year after year by numerous independent polls.  TripAdvisor has awarded LaBelle Winery the Certificate of Excellence and Open Table's Diners' Choice Award for The Bistro.  All ages are welcome, as well as dogs on our outdoor spaces in Amherst and Derry (including outdoor dining).

Visit our website for the most current hours of operation in each location, as well as directions. Website http://www.labellewinery.com External link for LaBelle Winery Industry Hospitality Company size 51-200 employees Headquarters Amherst, New Hampshire Type Privately Held Founded 2005 Specialties Wine, Restaurant, Private Events, Wine Tasting Room, Retail & Gift Shop, Weddings, Winery, Golf Course, Miniature Golf, Vineyard, and Corporate Events Locations Primary 345 Route 101 Amherst, New Hampshire 03031, US Get directions 14 NH-111 Derry, New Hampshire 03038, US Get directions Employees at LaBelle Winery Danielle Mojonnier Program Manager Marti Woodmansee La Belle Winery / President joe guarino Chef de cuisine at Labelle winery. I run all culinary operations Michelle Thornton See all employees Updates LaBelle Winery 1,383 followers 7mo Report this post Want to WOW your hardworking team members? Book your next corporate and non-profit event at LaBelle Winery! üòÅüç∑ Choose from various event packages and activities like golf & mini golf events, outdoor summer outings, fundraisers, and so much more.

Contact Stephanie Fournier at stephanie@experiencelabelle.com for more information and start planning your event with us today!

Check out our full list of programs via the link below: https://lnkd.in/g3SKDfqF 8 Like Comment Share LaBelle Winery 1,383 followers 1w Report this post LaBelle Lights is back for its fifth season beginning November 14th! ‚ú® With over 1,000,000 sparkling lights and whimsical winter-themed displays, this holiday tradition draws families and friends from across New England. Sponsorship opportunities give your business the chance to shine with logo placement, social media shoutouts, on-site signage, and more. Join us and connect with thousands of visitors, offering great visibility for your business. 

To learn more, email Erin Fitzgerald Rock at Erin@experiencelabelle.com , or view our available sponsorship packages here: https://lnkd.in/emMN--3V 6 Like Comment Share LaBelle Winery 1,383 followers 1mo Report this post Join a supportive and friendly team at LaBelle Winery! üçΩÔ∏è We're hiring full-time and part-time Dishwashers at our Derry, NH location. Enjoy competitive pay, great benefits, and a welcoming work environment!

Learn more & apply now on our website: https://lnkd.in/e-ifT4AC 8 1 Comment Like Comment Share LaBelle Winery 1,383 followers 1mo Report this post ‚ú® Looking to build visibility, increase engagement, or align your brand with a beloved holiday tradition? Partner with LaBelle Lights and make a lasting impression this season!
LaBelle Lights returns for the 2025-2026 season with over 1 million lights in stunning winter displays, and an atmosphere that draws more than 70,000 visitors each year. Sponsorship benefits include logo placement, on-site signage, social media features, and more - putting your business in front of engaged guests who value community and memorable experiences!

Visit our website to learn more & inquire! https://lnkd.in/eAe985ie 1 Like Comment Share LaBelle Winery reposted this Stephanie Fournier Experienced Hospitality & Non‚ÄëProfit Event Specialist| Open to New Hospitality Leadership Roles 1mo Report this post What an awesome day at LaBelle Winery SummerFest! 

A huge thank you to everyone who helped make it such a fun and memorable event. We had live music, lawn games, amazing local vendors, delicious food and drinks, and tons of activities for families.

I reached out and asked for support from some of my favorite businesses and groups in the New Hampshire community for this fun, free event‚Äîand wow, did you all come through. I‚Äôm so grateful!

Special shoutouts to:
 ü•Ñ Stonyfield for the yummy yogurt samples (kids and adults alike loved them!)
 üèÄ Dick‚Äôs House of Sport & üéØ YMCA of Greater Londonderry for keeping the fun going with awesome games 
 üöí Derry Fire Department for bringing the fire truck for a hit Touch-a-Truck experience
 üëã NH Granite State Ambassadors for being the perfect team to welcome our guests with warm smiles Kelly Bryer ‚öæÔ∏è New Hampshire Fisher Cats and the one-and-only Fungo for visiting and snapping pics with guests (I might be biased, but he‚Äôs the BEST mascot around!) Sydney Peterson, M.S. And to our incredible LaBelle team‚Äîyou truly went above and beyond. With this being our first-ever SummerFest, your hard work, energy, and teamwork made it all come together. So proud of what we accomplished! Especially our "SummerFest Captain", Danielle Mojonnier , you absolutely crushed it and made SummerFest unforgettable! 

Thanks to everyone who came out‚Äîwe loved celebrating with you and can‚Äôt wait to see you back again at LaBelle Winery soon! #LaBelleWinery #SummerFest #OneLaBelle #NewHampshireEvents #CommunitySupport 22 5 Comments Like Comment Share LaBelle Winery 1,383 followers 1mo Report this post The holidays will be here before you know it! üí´ Book your company party or gathering at LaBelle Winery before October 31st and receive complimentary holiday-themed centerpieces for your event. With planning support, on-site catering, and day-of coordination, we make hosting feel effortless. And if you're celebrating at our Derry location, you can add in a magical stroll through LaBelle Lights for your guests! 

Let us help you create a celebration to remember - inquire with Stephanie Fournier for promotion details or submit an event inquiry form here: https://lnkd.in/etcXnqBj 6 Like Comment Share LaBelle Winery 1,383 followers 2mo Report this post Dinner, a show, and a magical light experience, all in one night! ‚ú® Host your company‚Äôs holiday outing with a group dinner at Americus or The Bistro, followed by a LaBelle Winery performance, and receive complimentary tickets to LaBelle Lights for your group.

To learn more and book your outing, contact Stephanie Fournier at stephanie@experiencelabelle.com . We look forward to hosting you! 3 Like Comment Share LaBelle Winery 1,383 followers 2mo Report this post We‚Äôre thrilled to share that LaBelle Winery has earned top honors in the 2025 New Hampshire Union Leader Readers‚Äô Choice Awards! 

A huge congratulations to our Executive Chef, Justin Bernatchez, who was named Best NH Chef for the second year in a row ‚Äî a well-deserved recognition of his leadership and culinary excellence at Americus, The Bistro, and our events.
We‚Äôre also honored to be voted:
ü•á Best NH Vineyard/Winery
ü•á Best Wine Bar
ü•à Best NH Wedding Venue
ü•à Best Banquet/Event Facility
Thank you to everyone who voted and continues to support what we do ‚Äî your recognition means the world to us! 

Photographers- 
Genevieve Photography
Marina Zinovyeva Photography LLC +1 18 4 Comments Like Comment Share LaBelle Winery 1,383 followers 2mo Report this post We‚Äôre proud to share that our Amherst Vineyard Estate White has been named one of Visit NH‚Äôs Top 10 Summer Wines of the season!
Crafted by Winemakers Amy LaBelle and Melaney Shepard using grapes harvested from The Vineyards at LaBelle Winery in Amherst, this limited-release wine is a seasonal favorite. Its fresh, crisp, and beautifully balanced profile makes it a perfect pairing for seafood, salads, and summer gatherings.
Explore more about this wine and our vineyards at https://labellewinery.com/ 11 2 Comments Like Comment Share LaBelle Winery 1,383 followers 2mo Report this post Join a creative and supportive team by working at LaBelle Winery! üßëüç≥ We're hiring for Sous Chefs and Line Cooks to join our Amherst and Derry restaurant teams. Port LaBelle Inn & Conference Center | Hotel & Conference Center (863) 675-4411 Booking@stmatthewshouse.org 1563 Oxbow Dr. LaBelle Fl 33935 0 Items Home About Us Port LaBelle Inn Catering Booking Contact Us Select Page The Port LaBelle Inn and Conference Center is nestled in historic LaBelle , with restaurants, golfing, shopping and much more. Guests will enjoy spacious rooms with free WiFi, an outdoor pool, and sports courts on property. More About Us! We‚Äôre Under Renovation to Serve You Better! The Port LaBelle Inn is currently closed for renovations as we make exciting upgrades to enhance your future stay. We are not accepting new reservations at this time. Thank you for your patience and support as we invest in a refreshed guest experience. We can‚Äôt wait to welcome you back soon with improved amenities and upgraded comfort. Stay tuned for updates and reopening dates. For inquiries, please contact us at 863-675-4411. Pool Come swim in beautiful Florida weather as you get that perfect tan! Outdoor Activities We offer numerous outdoor activities that includes tennis courts, volleyball, basketball, and canoeing. Learn More!
